description: The start time of the event in epoch time format
name: Time

description: The duration of the event in seconds.
name: Duration

description: The device that likely initiated the event.
name: SrcDevice

description: The port used by the SrcDevice.
name: SrcPort

description: The port used by the DstDevice.
name: DstPort

description: The number of packets the SrcDevice sent during the event.
name: SrcPackets

description: The number of packets the DstDevice sent during the event.
name: DstPackets

description: The number of bytes the SrcDevice sent during the event.
name: SrcBytes

description: The number of bytes the DstDevice sent during the event.
name: DstBytes
